name: Year of the Dragon Punch
description: Missy Valentine's Year of the Dragon punch is an highly herbal and floral mainstay on the menu at Elizabeth St. Café in Austin. Fresno peppers and ginger beer add a zingy spice.  The ruby red color is derived from a beet infused sake.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound beets, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
10 ounces fresh lime juice from 15 to 20 limes

recipeInstructions.text: To make the beet infused sake, combine cubed beets and sake and let sit for 1 hour. Strain and store in a sealed container.
To make the punch, muddle the chili in a pitcher and add the beet infused sake, simple syrup, lime juice, and sherry. Refrigerate until ready to serve, up to 4 hours.
To serve, combine the punch base with ginger beer in an ice filled pitcher or punch bowl. Serve in ice-filled glasses.
